title.rendered: Students of Greenlawns School celebrate Van Mahotsav

content.rendered:
Smile Foundation organized a Van Mahotsav for students of Greenlawns School, Neura in Goa. The students were sensitized about their responsibilities towards the environment and society. Children from younger classes also participated in a spelling competition on the theme of nature. The school’s Principal, Mrs. Aurea Noronha, along with the teachers, encouraged the students throughout the session.

Smile Foundation visits various privileged schools across India and conducts engaging sessions for the young minds, under its Child for Child programme. Children are sensitized in various causes, value systems and are ushered to realize their importance in growing up as responsible citizens of the country.
